website_summaries.verdict: With few issues and many more satisfied budget-conscious owners, this model is hands down the best value pick that readily dispenses perfectly hot or cold water.
pros: Whether you want hot or cold water in an instant, this basic, nicely-designed unit efficiently delivers
Has a relatively small foot print and attractive looks
cons: Some leaks have been reported, but customer service is attentive
The water flow is a bit slow
Won't accommodate all types of water bottles

customer_reviews.title: FOR THOSE COMPLAINING OF SLOW DISPENSING
customer_reviews.text: I had the same issue about 3 months after I purchased this product. I never had received a manual to use for trouble shooting, so I called the manufacture. They emailed me a manual right away, and let me know that slow dispersion of the water most often means the tip of the dispenser needs to be cleared with a tooth-pick or the unit needs to be cleaned. Upon doing both of those things, it now dispenses water quickly and easily again. For those complaining of this issue, it's an easy fix (it's a maintenance issue on the owner's end - not an issue with the product).
customer_reviews.author: whitingjen

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this for about a year now. I have to say I'm very pleased with it. My kids love it also and it has made them want water more often. Water comes out pretty cold and the hot water gets very hot. Has a safety lock on the hot side to prevent kids from being able to press it and also has an on/off switch on the back for when you do or don't want to use the hot side. Gets hot pretty quickly too. Easy to clean and install new jugs.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Customer service number off the hook
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a year then started leaking and now we cannot use it. I’m trying to get in contact with customer service to hopefully replace the part that’s causing the leak but their phone is off the hook. Disappointing for how expensive it is. I just bought one for my parents before ours broke and regret the purchase if it only lasts for one year.
customer_reviews.author: kennedy

customer_reviews.title: The unit works fine, and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: The unit works fine, and looks nice. My problem with the cooler is that it is listed as compatible with both standard 5-gallon containers and the containers with the puncture caps. However, the reservoir in the unit is so small that no matter how quickly I flip the standard containers into place, I end up having to clean up the water that spilled over.
customer_reviews.author: jim estrada

customer_reviews.title: this has been a fantastic cooler stand
customer_reviews.text: So far, this has been a fantastic cooler stand. Very happy. Hot water perfect drinking temp for cocoa on a wintery morning. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mombo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great water cooler, that has been used for over a year now. No problems, works like on day one. Highly recommended. I don't use the hot button much, but the cold button makes nice and cool water.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 year and three months.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 1 year and 3 months and then the spout began to leak so heavily it made the dispenser unusable. Leaked from actual spout and above spout. Tried to call support and was told I’m out of warranty now. Buyer beware. Look elsewhere or get an extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very, very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I've had it for almost a year and no issues so far. No leaks, no noise, nothing. Cold water is cold, hot is hot. There's also a little LED light to illuminate the dispenser area that you can turn on and off with a switch in the back. I've been swapping the bottles with only Primo Water at Lowe's. It's around 6/7 dollars, but it tastes better than the other cheap water refill stations.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W. Frady

customer_reviews.title: Goos choice for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice. The only problem is that the hot water button sticks and is difficult to engage. Often takes two hands/fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the "cold" water is not very cold....not much colder than the room temperature
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Iturrino

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to setup and easy to load
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to setup and easy to load. The hot water isn't as hot as my previous Haier model, and the heating compartment doesn't store much hot water, but that's only because I have a large teapot to fill and I use an unusually large bowl to eat noodles. Overall it's an improvement to my previous unit, as this one is easier to operate and setup overall, great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Zhang

customer_reviews.title: It works well, but there is a consistent on-off ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but there is a consistent on-off grinding noise always coming from this machine. It is very irritating. I was wondering if others had this problem. It will be a pain, but unless it stops, I will have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: My_two_cents

customer_reviews.title: Bottle cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler, I am still learning how to adjust the water temperature. We have saved lots of money and time with this water dispenser. We bought two bottles at our local grocery story and continue using those. We go through water like crazy. Best purchase I ever made, should have made it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Becerra

customer_reviews.title: Our 20yr old one still works better. ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this unit 2 monthsand have grown to hate it. While it does function it is so incredibly s l o w to fill a simple 20oz cup
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: The previous dispenser we had used to flow really fast ...
customer_reviews.text: The previous dispenser we had used to flow really fast, twice as fast as this one. Now we had to wait double the time to fill the same water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: MoneyPageCommunity

customer_reviews.title: The machine is working fine, as per our needs
customer_reviews.text: The machine is working fine, as per our needs. Its slick, and looks good standing in a corner. Although came with a bunch of coupons for water refills and filters 'Expired" a year and half ago.
customer_reviews.author: Hina Khan

customer_reviews.title: very quite and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Its very quite and stylish for its size and price.
customer_reviews.author: Nash Ashumov

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well made, but slow output
customer_reviews.text: Gives hot and cold water as advertised. Is obviously well made, is quiet and works fine. Only complaint is that the water comes out painfully slow. For me, this is a large enough issue to knock it down a couple stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: takes FOREVER to fill your glass.
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser was slow to begin with. After 3 months it is down to a trickle. Takes 1-2 minutes to fill a 24 ounce glass. Primo.com FAQ/Help section is also worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: since I purchased it through Amazon I have to drain it and UPS it back which is very annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Second Primo water cooler I have purchased in two years. This one stopped cooling the water after two days of use. Now, since I purchased it through Amazon I have to drain it and UPS it back which is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I like it, however I didn't give it a 5th ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, however I didn't give it a 5th star because it pours slow! The ones I used to rent from a water service always poured at a decent rate, but this wasn't not so much....my finger gets tired from pushing the button.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli E Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good value .
customer_reviews.text: Works well .easy to set up .Water spout's are too low .
customer_reviews.author: Ed CIPO

customer_reviews.title: It was working great until 2 weeks ago -now water dripples out and ...
customer_reviews.text: It was working great until 2 weeks ago -now water dripples out and takes forever to fill. Our water guy looked at and nothing can be done. Its only been 6 months-frustating.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: the water dispensing starts great but becoming slower & slower
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd machine in 3 months, the water dispensing starts great but becoming slower & slower, after a few weeks it can take 1 minute or more to fill up an 7 oz cup
customer_reviews.author: N U

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after two months
customer_reviews.text: Works well when we got it. But after two months the cooler stop working!
customer_reviews.author: Yilin Liu-Leitke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My PRIMO WATER Tank is so nice to have.it working as fine as ever.good buy.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: It is VERY SHORT. You almost need to kneel to fill a water bottle. I am a short h person and I need to kneel.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Really like that it works without electricity. I like room temperature water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My safe water.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Like that has hot water also. Perfect for my available space. Will know after it has been used a while
customer_reviews.author: Mary Guglielmino

customer_reviews.title: Buy Another Brand
customer_reviews.text: Cold water is not so cold, hot water doesn't work anymore. Purchased 5 months ago. And not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: C.Lebron

customer_reviews.title: I love it but second 5 gallon bottle leaked Had to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it but second 5 gallon bottle leaked Had to move it to the patio I think the problem was more with the bottle rather than the cooler Our 3rd bottle is fine
customer_reviews.author: Anita Creamer

customer_reviews.title: Drink up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and it looks great. I like it a lot and has a safety button for he hot water. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Salvo

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this, installed it...and the water leaked out all over my floor. Trying to get them to send a replacement but not getting a quick response. I would avoid this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Orum

customer_reviews.title: Love the hot water and room temperature water but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the hot water and room temperature water but the cold water could be a little colder. All and all nice unit!
customer_reviews.author: Darold L.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service but not a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after two weeks of use, great customer service but not a great product.
customer_reviews.author: J.F

customer_reviews.title: I read that there were other people that had used ...
customer_reviews.text: I read that there were other people that had used this with the Zero Water cooler dispenser so I purchased this one. It leaks when more than one gallon of water is put in. I was foolish to purchase something this large online. I'm still working on a solution.
customer_reviews.author: bunniwife

customer_reviews.title: It seems sturdy and the water is cold
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Have only had this item for about a month, and I do not use the water heating system. It seems sturdy and the water is cold. No issues thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: noiseless and conveniently compact
customer_reviews.text: The bubbler has turned out to be a great purchase, simplifying our day to day. it is extremely quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Algis Vargas

customer_reviews.title: she thinks it's funny to get me some HOT water
customer_reviews.text: It is exciting when I ask my 5 yrs old granddaughter to get me so water out of the cooler, she thinks it's funny to get me some HOT water. I didn't realize how hot the water would be.
customer_reviews.author: Mary James

customer_reviews.title: Mommy, can i have a drink please?
customer_reviews.text: Not shabbat friendly unless you unplug it. It seems the middle button which is supposed to be room temperature is actually cold. But we are so happy with this purchase, we all drink a lot more water now. And kids don't ask for sweet drinks anymore because they have a nice cold drink of water. And it's awesome to have hot water available all the time! Now I am not lazy to make tea for the kids before school. Also, the best part..... "Mommy, can I have a drink please?" "Yes sure sweety, go and get it yourself" SCORE!
customer_reviews.author: lala123

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the compressor for the cold water did not work!!! returned this item
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Primo Top Loading Water Cooler a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Although I've only had this water cooler for a week, it's has exceeded my expectations. Replaced my GE which is no longer made - or even serviced by GE anymore - with hesitation. So far, so good. Cold water is very cold, hot water hot enough. Love the night lite feature. Only problem I have is that the unit could be a little taller. I am five feet tall - and I have to bend down to access the spigots. If you are taller, you might find this annoying. Other than that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mini Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Loving it at the church!
customer_reviews.text: We needed something for church since we got rid of the old traditional fountain. Everyone is loving it! I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nisey60

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice. I like the 3 temps of water @ my finger tips.Easy to use & great tasting water.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was nice until the hot water part just stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Don. H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ... no problems what so ever been wanting one for some time and glad I picked this one

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife and kids.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it so that is all that matters. The kids use the hot water feature to make hot chocolate on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa User

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice cooler and love the hot water feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I thought it would be bulky and not look so good in my kitchen, but it looks good and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: This dispenser did not last long. Maybe a year ...
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser did not last long. Maybe a year? The water dispensed quite slowly and wasn't always cold. Eventually it starting leaking all over my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J Ray

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, just totally different than the one it replaced

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Dispenses tepid not cold water. Have to cut the cord on it to return it and go without the product until they send you a new one. Construction not great, all plastic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the family and got rid of bottled water
customer_reviews.author: K H.

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: This is a really awesome water dispenser, it looks very high grade besides some plastic parts here and there but they do feel durable. All in all this is an efficient water dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Bloof

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Why it took so many years for me to finally purchase one I don't know. Water is great and the system is very easy to use and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: talitha matthews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a couple months and love it! It dispenses water easily and cleanly!
customer_reviews.author: Jmanh12

customer_reviews.title: It Leaks
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly for two weeks then it started leaking. I'm still waiting for my refund or product; they haven't responded to my clarify questions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: The cooler Is Great looking and works perfectly. It was exactly what I was expecting- I definitely would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: anniet

customer_reviews.title: top loading bottled water cooler
customer_reviews.text: Its everything it said it was we use it all the time. Love the cold and hot water feature now could not be with out it!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Economical way to have good H2O
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks good, works the way it is supposed to, and fits in a small space. I did set it on top of a small platform to raise the dispenser spout and used the included bracket to secure it to the wall to prevent tipping. It came with $8 worth of coupons for Primo water which is readily available around here at least, reducing the price further.
customer_reviews.author: GratefulinGulfport

customer_reviews.title: IT IS GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: IT IS EAST TO SET U[P, EASY TO USE, AND IT HAVE HOT AND COLD WATER. I USE IT ALL THE TIME. I AM SO HAPPY I GOT IT. THANKS PRIMO.
customer_reviews.author: AARON  JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Switches Should be On Front
customer_reviews.text: This is a good water cooler - we looked at quite a few before ordering and are generally happy with it. I do wish that the on/off switches were on the front of the machine. Once you've mounted the wall harness, it's not easy to see/operate the switches.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: From the brand I had prior, this unit was ...
customer_reviews.text: From the brand I had prior, this unit was lower to the ground, very hard to load jugs with out spilling a lot of water all over, and no red hot indicator light for when the water was hot.
customer_reviews.author: David Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Cooler
customer_reviews.text: We love it so far (it's been 6 weeks). Great water pressure, and the hot and cold temps are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: received in box, took out of box, bought ...
customer_reviews.text: received in box, took out of box, bought 5 gallon jug. i am now enjoying fresh, clean, no odor water. something you can not get from of the tap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for our water dispensing.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great. We have hot water, cold water, and room temp water at our fingertips. This unit does everything we want for water dispensing. Our kids can easily get their own water. Easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Welch

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.  Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, I saw that several leak. I've had this for at least 4 months not a single leak any where. Runs quietly, cools well, I've not used the heating portion. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Snipes

customer_reviews.title: Great dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: Love this dispenser!!! Hot is boiling and cold is icy!!! Easy set up, small convenient size. My 4 yr old loves how easy it is to use. Shes obsessed with drinking water now! Definate recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kate VT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and fast deleivery
customer_reviews.text: The Hot/Cold Water Cooler came in excellent shape and it works really well I use the Primo Water from Wal mart and it works really well...Thank you Primo...I don t like tap water and that's why I bought this machine plus I had water filter under the spiket and I had to keep replacing the filter and the system that colst money and with this machine all you have to do is purchase Primo water from Wal mart and put it right on the machine and wait one hour for the cold and 45 mins for the hot...Again yes I would recommend this to anyone who would like to know about it
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: This water cooler is very well made and does not take up a lot of room. Installation was a breeze and the water temperatures are outstanding. You can even keep the hot side off if you do not require it. Wonderful price and outstanding product
customer_reviews.author: SGTJACKSON

customer_reviews.title: it looks very nice and features are good
customer_reviews.text: it looks very nice and features are good. I have only had for a couple of weeks and so far it is doing just fine. i did call customer service with a question and i got a quick and clear response--that was a good sign to me. Shipping was quick and arrived in good condition--easy to unpack and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. Inferior quality and will break and then trash
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months broke and it only has a 30 day return exchange so after 30 days in the trash it goes. Inferior quality and after 30 days your on your own. DO NOT BUY!!!!! Beware will last only a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Gus Lewkowicz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This product only worked for 2 months. Now water trickles out taking too l o n g to fill cups. Do not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great water cooler
customer_reviews.text: the water comes out nice and cold and the hot comes out nice and hot.Easy to clean.looks nice in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the 3 temperature options. The product works very well, with no issues. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Cools my water just fine! We were once subscribers to Ozarka home delivery service, hundreds of dollars later we decided to save a bunch of money by bringing home our own water from the grocery store
customer_reviews.author: Robert Castoreno III

customer_reviews.title: NO REGRETS!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was really fast! It was like 2 or 3 days ahead of the scheduled delivery date. The dispenser itself was excellent. Easy to take out from the box, no heavy lifting. Easy set-up! Had it plugged for only couple of minutes and water was cold already. Didn't try the hot water at that time as it was a very hot weather. But the hot water was really hot! Buttons were easy to push. (3) switched at the back were great (hot, cold, LED nightlight). Quiet dispenser! Overall, I am very pleased with this product and with the seller! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Myca

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't recommend this product. It started leaking after only two weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A King

customer_reviews.title: top loading bottled water cooler
customer_reviews.text: doesnt come with water bottle doesnt keep water very cold and never gets hot order thru 3 rd party trying to save money thru company called unbeatable prices what terable sitution absoulute nightmare
customer_reviews.author: kris iverson

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Probe Problems Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After about every six months the cheap plastic probe has cracked around its mountings from the physical act of changing the five gallon water bottles. It's not always easy to align the heavy bottle perfectly while trying not to spill water everywhere. Bumping the probe too hard will cause it to crack at its base. Replacement probes with the attached collars cost at least 8 dollars, and only can be ordered from Primo over the phone. It adds up over time!!! I wish the probes were made sturdier, then I would love this dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Creepella

customer_reviews.title: You'll never regret buying a water cooler except having to deal with the jugs.
customer_reviews.text: Been through a lot of crummy water coolers and they all seem to break with in a year. This one stands the test of time, though, as it's my second one, having given my first one to my parents and it's still running strong. Not too loud, keeps water cold, handy LED light. I don't use the heated water option though. There's a whisper of stainless steel too so it doesn't look right out of the office hallway.
customer_reviews.author: Monte Del Roy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaced another Primo unit. This one is even better than the old one. First off, the reservoir is stainless steel. I know because i took it apart to check. It keeps the cold water very cold, which we like. It DOES have the little night light which was also important for us. Unit is very quiet. Actually quieter than the old one. All in all, very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Salemi

customer_reviews.title: Does not shut off, drips for awhile after use.
customer_reviews.text: It is really a pain - it drips for a bit after you let go of the control buttons- all 3 of them have the same problem. it doesn't do it every time but most of the time. It is a real problem with children because they forget to watch and water ends up on the floor because the little overflow tray gets full. I would sent it back but I threw away the box! Don't buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Camelot 40

customer_reviews.title: Started fine, nowa a Burden
customer_reviews.text: I've had this item since the end of April 2018, and for some reason I'm not getting but 1/4 of the original water output, I've literally only used the machine with 9 total 5 gallon containers of water, and I'm already having problems with the unit. What makes it worst the only troubleshooting info I can find is to see if the top of the unit is well sealed (which it is) and no other option to fix the problem, I feel like I threw my money in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Scott

customer_reviews.title: 14 months later and never had an issue with it!
customer_reviews.text: We use this on a daily basis and have never had an issue with it. Hot water is perfect for tea, soup, cocoa, and instant coffee. Cold is perfect to drink, but I still do add ice. I started with a 5 gal jug, but quickly changed to the 3 gal. So much easier for me to handle. Very happy with this dispenser!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: No room temperature water with cold water switch turned on
customer_reviews.text: This may work for people who need just hot and cold water. The water comes out piping hot and freezing cold. However, I bought it based on the description that said it dispenses room temperature water as well, which it does not. If the cold water switch is turned off, the middle button will dispense room temperature water. However, as soon as it's switched on, the middle button dispenses water that is just as cold as the cold water button. Unfortunately I had to return this item because it did not provide the 3 different temperatures to suit all tastes in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon Buyer!

customer_reviews.title: Tiny sized cooler
customer_reviews.text: I expected a regular sized water cooler - this is a tiny one. Very low to the floor so you have to bend over the whole time trying to fill the glass, only fits a regular size glass in waterway as it is very small. No water pitcher, travel mugs, large water bottles fit in opening to fill and it takes forever to fill any large jugs (and can only fill half way because you have to hold them sideways as they do not fit in the water opening). anyone looking for a normal sized water cooler - this is NOT it.
customer_reviews.author: DEB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 3-temperature Water
customer_reviews.text: The cold water is refreshingly cool, and the hot water is hot enough for quick oatmeal or instant coffee. But be warned - if you're a coffee enthusiast it will not be hot enough for you. The water is available everywhere (Home Depot, Lowes, Kroger, but make sure PRIMO is available nearby for sure). It's better water than several vendors we've tried over the years. My wife is a water snob, and it's good enough for her, so PRIMO must be doing something right (however, she's also the coffee enthusiast that needs hot-hot water).
customer_reviews.author: Aungen

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this cooler long enough to be certain it's great, but so far it has been. Two weeks and no problems. Shipping was faster than expected. I havent had any leaks, and the hot/cool/cold water functions work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Owens

customer_reviews.title: 10 Months Then Started To LEAK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dispenser on February 2015 from Amazon. It was working just fine, cold is cold enough and hot is ok, I was happy with this product in general. But then, I noticed a wet spot on the carpet near the dispenser, and when I moved the dispenser I found that it's leaking from the base. I am still trying to contact Primo but from what I have read on the reviews I can see that they have nothing to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Shabeeb

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a little over a year despite normal/minimal use
customer_reviews.text: It was very well taken care of, with honestly pretty minimal use. But about 16 months in it irreparably died. Same as others said, warranty only lasted a year so they said we are out of luck. For this price, to literally fall apart after a year is a little embarrassing. Avoid this one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Simple low-tech water cooler. Be advised that the hot ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple low-tech water cooler. Be advised that the hot water is tepid, and not suitable for making tea, coffee or other hot drinks. That is why I am giving it only 3 stars. As a water cooler only, I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: only 6 months of service
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, it was great. The cold option was colder than my previous cooler. However this one only lasted 6 months. My previous lasted aout 15 years. I had similar hopes for this one but a crucial part of it broke. The part that goes into the bottle no longer operates correctly and has become a nuisance. That was a lot of money to spend for 6 months of service.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a short while.
customer_reviews.text: actually plugged up about three months after purchase, and so far I have not figured how to remove the plug, no water comes out when it is full and you push down on the release handle.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Schultze

customer_reviews.title: Low quality..very slow water flow
customer_reviews.text: We've had this cooler for over 2 years. From the start, it had very slow water flow. After year 1 the plastic punch broke so now we have to manually remove the tops from the 5 gallon bottles.
customer_reviews.author: JWP

customer_reviews.title: I like the lighing option and ability to switch on/off hot/cold ...
customer_reviews.text: Besides making a breating sound (I get scared sometimes thinking there is someone in the kitchen. It's freaky.) is works perfectly and looks sleek. I like the lighing option and ability to switch on/off hot/cold water functions. It would have been nice if there was a storage at the bottom but not a deal breaker. Definetely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: H. C. Celik

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I never experienced the plastic smell or taste with this unit. The hot is hot enough for tea, cocoa and instant oatmeal. The cold is cold enough. It is not as cold as if I had put ice in my glass, but it is plenty cold and refreshing. The unit is also super quiet.
customer_reviews.author: marla3206

customer_reviews.title: Slow dispensing
customer_reviews.text: It works but very slowly. I’ve never seen any spout dispense water so slowly it takes almost a minute to fill a big plastic cup. It works as intended but very slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Gouki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tower had been great for the last few years! Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No leaks and water is cool
customer_reviews.text: No leaks, which is probably the most important thing. Water is pretty cool, hot water is not as hot as I would like. Looks pretty conservative, and I wasn't looking for a snazzy design. Does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: YourNameHereX_________

product_meta.title: Primo - Easy Top Loading Water Dispenser - Black - Stainless Steel - 3 Spout - Instant Cold, Cool, and Hot Water - UL Certified and Energy Star
product_meta.description: Dispenses icy cold or hot water, 2.0 compressor cooling system. Energy-saving switch for hot water. Stainless steel reservoir for taste and reliability. Convenient push-button controls on top. LED nightlight. Dual spout, universal probe with leak guard, and stainless steel drip tray. Black/stainless steel. ENERGY STAR qualified. Capacity: For use with 3 or 5 gallon water bottle. 10.8" W x 35.9" H x 11.3" D. The product is manufactured in China.
feature_bullets: Money-saving coupons for Primo water included
Piping hot water with child-resistant safety feature, ice-cold, and cool water temperatures
Spill-proof bottle holder with Leak Guard
Stainless steel door and water reservoirs and removable, stainless steel, dishwasher-safe drip tray
